basic.description: A study of second language acquisition with emphasis on the learning process, the influence of the first language, the concept of interlanguage, the role of learning strategies.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Acquisition d¿une langue seconde

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     (FREN373 and [FREN353 or FREN393 or FREN215]) or (LING100 and FREN110) or (LING100 and a grade of B in FREN100) and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Equivalency    LING493.
